title: Warm turkey salad with coronation dressing
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '250g cooked turkey meat, shredded', '2 sticks celery, sliced', '100g dried apricots, chopped', '75g walnut pieces', '1 tablespoon tikka paste', '3 tablespoons half fat mayonnaise', 'juice of 1 lemon', '4 tablespoons water', '1 round lettuce, shredded']
